text: Bentley is a village and civil parish in the North Warwickshire district of Warwickshire, England, about two miles south-west of Atherstone. According to the 2001 census it had a population of 101. From the Census 2011 the population of Bentley has been included in Merevale. ==References== Category:Villages in Warwickshire
title: Bentley, Warwickshire
